Major_Arcs.title: Introduction of Human Meteor and Initial Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Human Meteor, his secret identity, and the initial events that lead him to investigate suspicious activities at the waterfront.

sub_scenes.title: Cover Introduction and Taxi Duty
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers the comic's cover introduction and Duke's initial taxi driving job, setting up his normal life before superhero action.

sub_scenes.title: Suspicion and Transformation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Duke noticing G-Man Holden's car and his decision to transform into the Human Meteor to investigate, initiating the superhero plotline.

Major_Arcs.title: Human Meteor's Initial Actions and New Mission
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Human Meteor's first actions as a superhero, leading to a hospital visit and a new mission involving a yacht and a suspected Japanese submarine.

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Human Meteor confronting 'cop shooters', the aftermath of this action, and a visit to G-Man Holden in the hospital.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Infiltration Plan and Initial Success
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers the planning phase for infiltrating the yacht and Toby's successful stowaway, setting the stage for investigation.

Major_Arcs.title: Yacht Investigation and Underwater Confrontation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the investigation on the yacht by Duke and Toby, leading to Toby's capture, Duke's rescue, and the discovery of the Japanese submarine.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Investigation and Toby's Peril
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Duke's cabin investigation on the yacht and the immediate danger Toby faces after being discovered.

sub_scenes.title: Rescue and Submarine Revelation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers Duke rescuing Toby, the revelation of Toby's undercover role, and the discovery of the yacht's mission linked to a Japanese submarine.

narrative_arcs.title: Duke's Rescue and Yacht's True Mission

Major_Arcs.title: Underwater Combat and Ship Attack
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts Human Meteor's underwater battles with divers, confrontation with a new diver, and his attack on the submarine and the ship.

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Battles and New Threat
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers the underwater fight with old-fashioned divers and the subsequent encounter with a new diver and a tentacle attack.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation with New Diver and Tentacle Attack

sub_scenes.title: Submarine and Ship Attacks
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Human Meteor attacking the submarine with a torpedo and then shifting his target to the ship above.

narrative_arcs.title: Duke Targets the Ship and Needs Air

Major_Arcs.title: Evidence Gathering and Return to Normal Life
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Duke surfacing, gathering evidence on the yacht, and returning to his civilian life, including visiting Holden and going home.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Evidence and Naval Report
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Duke surfacing, finding the depth map on the yacht, and presenting it to a naval officer as evidence.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery on the Yacht and Map Revelation

sub_scenes.title: Return to Civilian Life
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Duke and Toby's return to civilian activities, including a motorcycle ride, hospital visit to Holden, and going home for the night.

Major_Arcs.title: Boys' Adventure and Bus Garage Conspiracy
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts focus to Skip and Chuck, their discovery of a wallet, and their accidental involvement in uncovering a Nazi spy ring at a bus garage.

sub_scenes.title: Imagined Conflict and Ambulance Sighting
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene begins with an imagined dramatic scene before transitioning to the boys noticing an ambulance and an injured man.

sub_scenes.title: Wallet Discovery and Garage Approach
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the boys finding a dropped wallet, investigating its address, and noticing a marine saluting a civilian near the bus garage.

narrative_arcs.title: Ambulance Interne Drops Wallet and Boys Investigate
Marine Salutes Civilian and Boys Inquire

sub_scenes.title: Bus Garage Encounter and Mr. Horst
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the boys arriving at the bus garage, being led inside, and their intimidating encounter with Mr. Horst.

narrative_arcs.title: Boys Arrive at Bus Garage and Encounter Uniformed Man
Boys Led to Mr. Horst and Instructed to Wait
Sudden Grab and Confrontation with Mr. Horst

Major_Arcs.title: Bus Garage Conspiracy Uncovered and Fight for Escape
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc covers the boys' interrogation by Horst, the revelation of the carbon monoxide plan, the ensuing fight, and Major Bronson's shooting.

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and Sinister Plot
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Horst questioning the boys, a separate accusatory scene, Horst's order for violence, and the carbon monoxide plan.

narrative_arcs.title: Horst Questions Boys About Wallet Contents
Accusation of Lying in Another Room

sub_scenes.title: Garage Fight and Bronson's Downfall
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the chaotic fight in the garage, the boys being overpowered, the gun threat to the boys, and Major Bronson's shooting by Horst.

narrative_arcs.title: Fight Breaks Out and Order to Stop
Man with Glasses Threatens Boys with Gun

Major_Arcs.title: Escape, Marine Intervention, and Nazi Spy Ring Defeat
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shows the boys' escape, Chuck's encounter with the Marine, Skip's discovery of sabotage plans, and the Marines' intervention leading to the defeat of the Nazi spy ring.

sub_scenes.title: Seeking Help and Sabotage Discovery
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers the boys' decision to seek help, Chuck meeting the Marine Sergeant, and Skip discovering sabotage plans in a secret office.

narrative_arcs.title: Skip Discovers Sabotage Plans and Confrontation

sub_scenes.title: Marine Barracks and Final Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the alert at the Marine Barracks, the car crash, Skip's defense against attack, and the Marines' arrival and intervention.

narrative_arcs.title: Skip's Book Defense and Gun Confrontation

sub_scenes.title: Aftermath and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes the Nazi spy ring plotline with the aftermath of the fight, Major Bronson's injury, and the announcement of victory.

Major_Arcs.title: Introduction of Champ and Henry and South American Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Champ and Henry and their adventures, starting with their discovery in a South American town and subsequent interrogation.

sub_scenes.title: Character Introduction and Location Discovery
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Champ and Henry and sets the scene in a South American town where their location is revealed to authorities.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of The Champ and Henry

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and Kidnapping Revelation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the officers' interrogation of Champ and Henry and the revelation of Rosita's kidnapping by El Tigre.

narrative_arcs.title: Interrogation and Revelation of Rosita's Kidnapping

Major_Arcs.title: Abduction, Rescue Plan, and Hideout Infiltration
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts Champ and Henry's abduction, their subsequent involvement in a rescue plan, and the infiltration of El Tigre's hideout.

sub_scenes.title: Forced Abduction and New Alliance
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers Champ and Henry's forced entry into a car and their abduction, leading them to a woman connected to Rosita.

sub_scenes.title: Hideout Infiltration and Distraction
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the planning of the hideout infiltration, the infiltration itself, and the use of stage dollars as a distraction.

narrative_arcs.title: Planning and Infiltration of El Tigre's Hideout

sub_scenes.title: Champ's Confrontation and El Tigre's Reveal
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Champ's arrival at the hideout, an implied confrontation, and the dramatic revelation of El Tigre's identity.

Major_Arcs.title: Interrogation, Search for Rosita, and Axis Plot
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the interrogation of El Tigre, the search for Rosita, and the revelation of Axis agents' involvement, complicating the rescue mission.

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Cryptic Thoughts
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts a harsh confrontation, El Tigre's weariness and a cryptic thought, and the initiation of the search for Rosita.

narrative_arcs.title: El Tigre's Weariness and Cryptic Thought
Searching for Rosita and Threatening El Tigre

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and Axis Revelation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers the direct interrogation of El Tigre about Rosita's location and his denial, followed by the revelation of Axis agents' involvement.

narrative_arcs.title: Interrogation about Rosita and Denial of Kidnapping

Major_Arcs.title: Rescue Mission and Confrontation at the Citadel
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the urgent rescue mission for Rosita, leading to a horseback pursuit, infiltration of the Citadel, and confrontation with enemies.

sub_scenes.title: Demand for Action and Urgent Pursuit
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows a leader demanding explanation about Tigre, his interrogation, news of Rosita's imprisonment, and the urgent call to action and pursuit.

narrative_arcs.title: Demand for Explanation Regarding Tigre's Actions
Urgent Call to Action and Pursuit
Determined Resolve to Rescue Rosita at Any Cost

sub_scenes.title: Citadel Infiltration and Rosita's Discovery
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the horseback pursuit, strategic planning to approach the Citadel, agile maneuvering, and finally discovering Rosita but facing immediate hostility.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of Rosita and Immediate Hostility

Major_Arcs.title: Rescue Combat and Aftermath
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the intense combat to rescue Rosita, followed by the arrival of government troops and initial positive resolution.

sub_scenes.title: Intense Rescue Fight and Machine Gun Threat
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the aggressive hand-to-hand combat during the rescue and the dangerous machine gun threat posed by a Nazi soldier.

narrative_arcs.title: Machine Gun Threat and Heroic Intervention

sub_scenes.title: Post-Conflict Recognition and Troop Arrival
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers the immediate aftermath of the fight, including expressions of gratitude and the arrival of government troops.

narrative_arcs.title: Government Troops and Search for Fascists

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan's Jungle Mission and Capture
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Devil Dog Dolan and his jungle mission, leading to combat, disobedience, capture, and interrogation.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Combat and Reporting Disobedience
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Devil Dog Dolan's jungle combat and his subsequent report to Captain Lawton about disobeying orders.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Pursuit and Ambush
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the pursuit into the jungle, the officer's trek and hidden threat, culminating in an ambush by native warriors.

sub_scenes.title: Capture and Torture for Information
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Dolan's capture, the sinister orders given by the commander, torture preparations, and the actual torture to coerce information.

Major_Arcs.title: Dolan's Counter-Action, Marine Pursuit, and Native Alliance
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shows Dolan's actions after torture, the marine's pursuit, the enemy's response, Dolan's fight with natives, and a shift in native allegiance.

sub_scenes.title: Dolan's Sabotage and Marine Pursuit
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Dolan admitting to actions and setting fire to supplies, and a marine's reaction and pursuit to stop him.

narrative_arcs.title: Dolan Admits and Acts to Burn Supplies

sub_scenes.title: Dolan's Fight and Native Alliance Shift
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Dolan's surprise attack and fight with natives, Grauer's departure, and the natives shifting allegiance to the marine.

narrative_arcs.title: Dolan's Surprise Attack and Fight with Natives
Natives' Homage and Gratitude to Marine

Major_Arcs.title: Captain's Decision, Shipboard Fight, and Service Discipline
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the Captain's dilemma and decision, a shipboard fight for 'American Justice', and the disciplinary actions taken afterwards.

sub_scenes.title: Captain's Choice and Shipboard Intervention
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers the Captain's dilemma about Grauer's demands and his decision to intervene in a shipboard confrontation.

sub_scenes.title: Aftermath and Service Discipline
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the aftermath of the shipboard fight, including rescinded shore leave, praise for Dolan, and service discipline enforced through spanking.

narrative_arcs.title: Shore Leave Rescinded and Dolan's Praise

Major_Arcs.title: Introduction of Twinkle Twins and the Burgess Murder Case
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Twinkle Twins and the Burgess murder case, setting up their investigation and initial clues.

sub_scenes.title: Twinkle Twins Introduction and Case Briefing
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the Twinkle Twins and their mission, followed by a briefing on the Robert Burgess murder case at the newspaper office.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of Twinkle Twins and their mission
Newspaper Office Briefing on Burgess Murder

sub_scenes.title: Police Inquiry and Hospital Visit
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the Twins' inquiry at the police station about Tom Reilly and their subsequent visit to the hospital to find him.

narrative_arcs.title: Hospital Visit and Discovery of Miss Reilly

Major_Arcs.title: Hospital Impressions, Racketeering Suspicion, and Radio Revelation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc covers the Twins' impressions of Miss Reilly, their growing suspicion of racketeering, and a crucial radio broadcast that changes the course of their investigation.

sub_scenes.title: Gentle Impression and Racketeering Suspicion
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the Twins leaving the hospital, their gentle impression of Miss Reilly, and Diane's suspicion of racketeering.

narrative_arcs.title: Candy Store Phone Inquiry to Elijah
Radio Broadcast Revelation and Reilly Pursuit

Major_Arcs.title: Irish Section Inquiry, Mrs. Murphy's Explanation, and Ambush
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the Twins' investigation in the Irish section, their conversation with Mrs. Murphy revealing Tom Reilly's innocence, and a sudden ambush.

sub_scenes.title: Irish Section Inquiry and Invitation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the Twins' inquiry in the Irish section and being invited inside by a woman.

sub_scenes.title: Mrs. Murphy's Explanation and Gunfire Ambush
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers Mrs. Murphy's explanation of Tom Reilly's situation and the sudden gunfire ambush interrupting their conversation.

narrative_arcs.title: Mrs. Murphy's Explanation of Tom Reilly's Situation

Major_Arcs.title: Car Chase, Citizen Uprising, and Police Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the car chase after Reilly, the intervention of the Irish neighborhood residents forming a blockade and uprising, and the final arrival of the police to resolve the situation.

sub_scenes.title: Car Chase and Neighborhood Blockade
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers the car chase after Reilly and the formation of a human blockade by the Irish neighborhood residents to stop the car.

sub_scenes.title: Citizen Uprising and Police Arrival
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the chaotic citizen uprising against the criminals in the car and the subsequent arrival of the police to take control.

sub_scenes.title: Crime Scene Assessment
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the police assessing the crime scene after the car chase and citizen intervention.

Major_Arcs.title: Medical Emergency and Community Blood Donation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the medical emergency for Tom Reilly, the need for a blood transfusion, and the community's heartwarming response to provide blood donors.

sub_scenes.title: Rushing to Shooting Scene and Hospital Arrival
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the Twins rushing back to the shooting scene, arriving at the hospital, and learning about the need for a blood transfusion for Reilly.

narrative_arcs.title: Hospital Arrival and Blood Transfusion Need
Blood Type Mismatch and Community Aid

sub_scenes.title: Community Blood Donation and Reilly's Recovery
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the urgent call for blood donors, the community's rapid response, the blood donation process, and Tom Reilly's revival after the transfusion.

narrative_arcs.title: Community Responds to Blood Donation Call

Major_Arcs.title: Farnacci's Arrest and Happy Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc concludes the Twinkle Twins story with Farnacci's arrest and a joyful celebration of Reilly's daughter's recovery, providing a happy ending to the case.

sub_scenes.title: Police Action and Farnacci's Arrest
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the plan to arrest Farnacci, the police confrontation in the pool room, and Farnacci's subsequent arrest.

narrative_arcs.title: Demand for Farnacci to Donate Blood and Police Action Plan
Police Confrontation and Arrest of Farnacci

sub_scenes.title: Happy Ending Celebration
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes the Twinkle Twins narrative with a joyful birthday party celebrating Reilly's daughter's recovery and the news of Farnacci's imprisonment.

narrative_arcs.title: Celebration of Reilly's Daughter's Recovery and Farnacci's Imprisonment
